strapiPost.title: New Outdoor Exhibit Opens At Crystal Bridges
strapiPost.content:
A brand-new outdoor, nighttime experience is coming to life at Crystal Bridges Museum of American Art today! 

  • Light & sound: The new experience is an interactive and immersive installation called Listening Forest and is an addition to the North Forest attractions. The installation consists of eight audiovisual artworks along the North Forest trail and will be open at night through January 1, 2023. 
  • Poetic project: Bringing together art and technology in a natural setting, Listening Forest will sense visitors, respond and “interact playfully and poetically with their participation.” Guest’s heart rates, bodies, voices, and movements will direct the forest’s response via 3,000 glimmering, pulsing lightbulbs and more.
